tool_description: Do you need to process and validate JSON and JSON schema? The JSON Toolbox offers various endpoints to format, analyze and validate JSON data.
name: JSON Toolbox
title: JSON Toolbox

api_list.name: AnalyzeJSONschema
api_list.description:
POST https://www.json-schema-linter.com/api/jsonschemalinter/analyze
Content-Type: application/json

Request content: JSON schema
Response body: Linter report. Empty if no issues are found.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://json-toolbox.p.rapidapi.com/api/jsonschemalinter/analyze"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "json-toolbox.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Apply JSONPatch operations
api_list.description: Applies one or multiple JSONPatch operations to JSON data. Response data contains the modified JSON.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://json-toolbox.p.rapidapi.com/api/jsonpatch/apply"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "json-toolbox.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: JSON Minify
api_list.description:
POST https://www.json-schema-linter.com/api/jsonlinter/minify
Content-Type: application/json

Request content: JSON input
Response body: Minified JSON data.
api_list.code:

url = "https://json-toolbox.p.rapidapi.com/api/jsonlinter/minify"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

        }

print(response.json())
